Title: Not You, Mr. Dake
Writer: Brian Koppelman (created by), David Levien (created by), Andrew Ross Sorkin (created by), Brian Koppelman, David Levien, Alice O'Neill (story editor), Randall Green (story editor), Wes Taylor (story editor)
Actors: Paul Giamatti, Damian Lewis, Maggie Siff, Malin Akerman
Plot: Axe and Chuck face mounting evidence of their involvement in the Ice Juice sabotage. Taylor questions Wendy's authority and motivations at Axe Capital. Connerty makes his case in court but comes up against unexpected witness testimony.
